alert.note: Alert for Graham (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued December 02 at 3:17PM CST until December 02 at 4:45PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Graham County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 445 PM CST. * At 316 PM CST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Morland to near Grainfield, moving southeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Near zero visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Locations impacted include... Hill City, Morland, Bogue, Nicodemus, Penokee, Saint Peter and Studley. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
